Cargo Size(s): 55,000 / 10% MOLOO
Cargo Type(s): Iron Ore Pellets in bulk, Max 1 Grade only, harmless, IMSBC Code, Appendix 1, Group C.

LOAD TERMS: 30 HRS, WWD, FHINC, NO TURN TIME.
Discharge Location: 1-2sb Dammam BERTH 21, AND/OR BERTH 22, AND/OR BERTH 41, SAUDI ARABIA.
DSCH TERMS: 10,000 MT PWWD, FHINC + 12 HRS TT USC IU ATUTC.
NO LIGHTERAGE OPERATION TO TAKE PLACE AT DISPORT DAMMAM, SAUDI ARABIA.

PLSD TO HEAR.
BEST REGARDS,
Siddharth Arya | Voyage Desk
